Thanks for the almost useless, glib answer.

ISafeRunnable has been moved to a new jar file org.eclipse.equinox.common_3.2.0.v20060603.jar
as have other core classes.  To me, this breaks
the standard naming convention and makes it rather
hard to find where these routines are now.  The
error would indicate that it still exists in a
org.eclipse.core.runtime_*.jar file.
